business_highlights:
approved by the FDA, but have multiple manufacturing 
sites that are approved by the FDA, as well as other regulators that enable us 
to build our generic business.

acquired the insulin brand from Lilly, 
which enables us to really gain the end-to-end economics on the product.

acquired with very limited promotion efforts, 
so we are looking at how we can build further on this start.

acquired Medisol, which gave us a very nice injectables portfolio that enables 
us to build our internal pipeline on top of this to build a business in France.
acquired a few, but not of scale.
